description: Add adaptive cruise control, lane centering, and forward collision warning to your Aptera. While engaged, driver monitoring ensures the driver is paying attention.
Integrated tent and rear awning gets you out in the wild but keeps you cozy inside. Also includes tail cover and step stool for easy entry.
Pet divider with ability to safely secure your friend during driving, accessories including water bowl, bags, and rear cover and ladder.
More ground clearance and tougher wheel covers so you can take your Aptera off-road.
